info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on Tag entity in your Azure API Management deployment. Tags can be assigned to APIs, Operations and Products.

get.description: Lists a collection of tags defined within a service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: Lists a collection of Tag entities.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Tag entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Tag already exists.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Tag Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

204.description: The tag details were successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes specific tag of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Tag Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the API.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Tag to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Api.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Api.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Api.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully detached the tag from the Api.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags descriptions in scope of API. Model similar to swagger - tagDescription is defined on API level but tag may be assigned to the Operations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tagDescriptions associated with the Api entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the API.

200.description: Gets the description of the tag specified by its identifier in scope if the Api.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create/Update tag description in scope of the Api.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Tag to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Tag Description was created for the Api.

200.description: Tag Description was updated for the Api.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete tag description for the Api.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully deleted tag description for the Api.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the Operation.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| method     | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| description | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| urlTemplate | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Operation entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the Operation.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Tag to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Operation.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully detached the tag from the Operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of operations associated with tags.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| name        | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| apiName     | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| description | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| method      | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |
| urlTemplate | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: Lists a collection of TagResource entities.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the Product.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
| Field       | Supported operators    | Supported functions                         |
|-------------|------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| id          | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Product entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the Product.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Tag to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Product.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Product.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The entity state (Etag) version of the Api schema to update. A value of "*" can be used for If-Match to unconditionally apply the operation.

204.description: Successfully detached the tag from the Product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: Properties supplied to Create Tag operation.

TagCreateUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to Create/Update Tag operations.

properties.description: Properties supplied to Create TagDescription operation.

TagDescriptionCreateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create TagDescription operation.

externalDocsUrl.description: Absolute URL of external resources describing the tag.

externalDocsDescription.description: Description of the external resources describing the tag.

TagDescriptionBaseProperties.description: Parameters supplied to the Create TagDescription operation.

TagIdParameter.name: tagId
TagIdParameter.description: Tag identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.
